name: Who I See Demo
description:
A second-person, story-rich mystery, in which the tale is told through the NPCs describing the strange actions of your strange main character.

When you think of folk tales, forests and mist rise in your mind. But humanity's soul has moved into the depths of rust, musk, and trash.

This city folk tale is told by three people at the same time. Everyone sees something different. Swears they saw the truth. The story is always changed by the teller.

Who do you see?

This is a tiny demo created for the Haunted PS1 Game Jam and lasts for about 6 ripe minutes. Only one teller has stepped up to the bonfire for now. The game should be completed by the end of November.

Send me your feedback to help this creature grow.

Unpack the ZIP, go into the Build folder, and click the WhoISee Unity exe.

-----------

Controls

-----------

WAD - W to move forward, A and D to rotate. There is no going back.

E - Talk with the Lovely Guests when prompted. 

Click/Spacebar - Continue the conversation, even when they don't want to.

-----------

Textures by: https://twitter.com/ChillworksDev Follow this for updates.

Models by: https://twitter.com/booanimation

Music by: https://twitter.com/cafofomusic

-----------

Follow for more information. Like and retweet the twitter posts.
